  • Method Details

    • Init

      public static void Init(Revs revs) throws SQLException
      1. Creates tables and alters permissions so every user is able to use all operations on sequences and tables

      2. Inserts a manager and server

      3. Inserts all of the menuItems for revs and alters where sequences start

      4. Inserts all the ingredients used at revs

      5. Creates relations between all the of menuItems and their ingredients

      Parameters:
      revs - Database Connection
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception with SQL

    • InsertOrder

      public static void InsertOrder(Revs revs, String customerName, Integer employeeID, Timestamp orderTime, ArrayList<OrderItem> orderItems) throws SQLException
      1. Creates order in orders table

      2. Using newly generated OrderID creates OrderItems, with the chargePrice set to the current MenuItem.price

      3. Updates order.chargePrice to the sum of the orderItems.price

      NOTE: is a transaction so if any part fails operation will halt 4. Updates inventory stock

      NOTE: this operation is a transaction so if any part fails a rollback occurs.

      Parameters:
      revs - Database Connection
      customerName - String - name of Customer
      employeeID - Integer - ID of employee
      orderTime - Timestamp - the time of order
      orderItems - ArrayList - list of items ordered
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception with SQL

    • CreateMenuItem

      public static Integer CreateMenuItem(Revs revs, MenuItem menuItem, ArrayList<HasIngredient> ingredients) throws SQLException
      1. Creates menuItem in MenuItems table

      2. Using newly generated MenuItemID creates HasIngredient

      NOTE: is a transaction so if any part fails operation will halt

      Parameters:
      revs - Database Connection
      menuItem - MenuItem - properties for menuItem
      ingredients - ArrayList - list of ingredients menuItems uses
      Returns:
      Integer - newly created menuItemID
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception with SQL
